languages.text: "Конечно, мне теперь по должности не положено рисковать собой". {n}Энрих грустно улыбается.{/n} "Все больше руководить, отправляя ребят в пекло. Но это все глупости — когда ситуация прижмет, я их одних там не оставлю".

"Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}He smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys and girls into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, мне теперь по должности не положено рисковать собой". {n}Энрих грустно улыбается.{/n} "Все больше руководить, отправляя ребят в пекло. Но это все глупости — когда ситуация прижмет, я их одних там не оставлю".

traits.locale_text: "Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}Einrich smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys in the fire. But it's all nonsense, and when the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

"Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}Einrich smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys in the fire. But it's all nonsense, and when the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

"Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}Einrich smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

"Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}Einrich smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

"Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}He smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys and girls into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

"Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}He smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys and girls into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

languages.text: « Bien sûr, au poste où je suis, je n'ai plus le droit de vraiment risquer ma vie de la sorte. » {n}Il esquisse un sourire triste.{/n} « Je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de déléguer et d'envoyer d'autres au charbon à ma place. Mais autant vous dire que le jour où ça tournera mal, il est hors de question que je les abandonne à leur sort. »
languages.original_text: "Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}He smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys and girls into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, au poste où je suis, je n'ai plus le droit de vraiment risquer ma vie de la sorte. » {n}Il esquisse un sourire triste.{/n} « Je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de déléguer et d'envoyer d'autres au charbon à ma place. Mais autant vous dire que le jour où ça tournera mal, il est hors de question que je les abandonne à leur sort. »

languages.text: «Por supuesto, con este trabajo ya no puedo jugarme la vida». {n}Sonríe con tristeza.{/n} «Ahora es todo gestión; no puedo hacer más que enviar a mis muchachos y muchachas a las llamas. Pero es una estupidez: si la cosa se pone fea, no pienso abandonarlos a su suerte».
languages.original_text: "Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}He smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys and girls into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, con este trabajo ya no puedo jugarme la vida». {n}Sonríe con tristeza.{/n} «Ahora es todo gestión; no puedo hacer más que enviar a mis muchachos y muchachas a las llamas. Pero es una estupidez: si la cosa se pone fea, no pienso abandonarlos a su suerte».

languages.text: “当然，由于我的职位限制，我没办法亲自去冒生命危险了。”{n}他露出了悲伤的笑容。{/n}“我现在做的事情就是管理人员，把那些年轻的小伙子、小姑娘们送到火海里。不过这都是胡说八道，要是情况真的非常糟糕，我绝对会冲进火场，把我的人带出来。”
languages.original_text: "Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}He smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys and girls into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

traits.locale_text: “当然，由于我的职位限制，我没办法亲自去冒生命危险了。”{n}他露出了悲伤的笑容。{/n}“我现在做的事情就是管理人员，把那些年轻的小伙子、小姑娘们送到火海里。不过这都是胡说八道，要是情况真的非常糟糕，我绝对会冲进火场，把我的人带出来。”

languages.text: 「この仕事は命を懸けるものではない」{n}彼は悲しそうに笑った。{/n}「最近は、少年少女を火の中に送り込むような方針だ。しかし、彼らのやっている事は無意味で、もし状況が悪化しても、彼らを独りぼっちに放っておくつもりはない」
languages.original_text: "Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}He smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys and girls into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

traits.locale_text: 「この仕事は命を懸けるものではない」{n}彼は悲しそうに笑った。{/n}「最近は、少年少女を火の中に送り込むような方針だ。しかし、彼らのやっている事は無意味で、もし状況が悪化しても、彼らを独りぼっちに放っておくつもりはない」

languages.text: "Natürlich gestattet mir der Posten nicht mehr, mein Leben zu riskieren." {n}Er lächelt traurig.{/n} "Heutzutage muss ich nur noch verwalten, delegieren, führen. Die Jungs und Mädchen ins Feuer schicken. Aber das ist alles Unsinn, und wenn es hart auf hart kommt, dann lasse ich sie nicht alleine dort."
languages.original_text: "Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}He smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys and girls into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich gestattet mir der Posten nicht mehr, mein Leben zu riskieren." {n}Er lächelt traurig.{/n} "Heutzutage muss ich nur noch verwalten, delegieren, führen. Die Jungs und Mädchen ins Feuer schicken. Aber das ist alles Unsinn, und wenn es hart auf hart kommt, dann lasse ich sie nicht alleine dort."

languages.text: "Elbette iş tanımım, artık yaşamımı riske atmama müsaade etmiyor." {n}Hüzünlü bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bugünlerde yalnızca yönetimden sorumluyum, oğlanları ve kızları ateşin içine gönderiyorum. Tabii bunların hepsi boş iş, mesele ciddileştiğinde onları bir başlarına bırakmam."
languages.original_text: "Of course, the job description doesn't allow me to risk my life now." {n}He smiles sadly.{/n} "It is all about management these days, sending the boys and girls into the fire. But it's all nonsense, and if the going gets tough, I won't leave them there alone."
